panelText.text: During the next scheduled system inspection, a different Johnson Controls technician is on site. Rafael makes the same offer – but, instead of accepting, the technician calls his manager, who involves the Compliance team.

During the investigation that follows, Carlos is questioned about the previous inspection – and he admits that he accepted cash to inspect and service devices that the customer installed. Carlos faces disciplinary action for his behavior, and he will likely lose his job.
